 import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserDetailsComponent } from '../user-details/user-details.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-show-users', templateUrl: './show-users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./show-users.component.css'] }) export class ShowUsersComponent { userDetails:Array=[]; constructor(private _userDetailsComponent:UserDetailsComponent) { // _userDetailsComponent.getUsers(); // this.userDetails=_userDetailsComponent.userDetails; this.userDetails } DeleteUser(user:any) { this._userDetailsComponent.DeleteUser(user); } }
